typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string,
		indicator as string,
		daily_count as string,
		date_country as string,
		rate_14_day as string,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(continent == 'Europe') ~> FilterContinent
FilterContinent select(mapColumn(
		country,
		continent,
		population,
		daily_count,
		date_country,
		rate_14_day
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(date_country = iifNull(toDate(date_country,
'dd/MM/yyyy'), toDate(date_country,
'yyyy-mm-DD'))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		country as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string,
		daily_count as string,
		date_country as string,
		rate_14_day as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['cases_death.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		country,
		continent,
		population,
		daily_count,
		date_country,
		rate_14_day
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
